comments.author: alexander.wilms@zoho.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: 20110521002552

The infedinite progress bar is rectangular, but it should be rounded.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Press the "Get Mail" button. Look at the progress bar at the bottom

Actual Results:  
It looks a bit off

Expected Results:  
It should look like the progress bar which is shown when the mail is being downloaded. (http://ubuntuone.com/p/urU/)
comments.raw_text:

richard.marti@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
I could reproduce this on my Linux VM. Thunderbird has no special CSS styles which can affect this.

I tried also FF 4.0.1 and FF 6.0a1 and saw the same effect. This looks more like a Toolkit problem.
comments.creator: richard.marti@gmail.com
comments.text:
I could reproduce this on my Linux VM. Thunderbird has no special CSS styles which can affect this.

I tried also FF 4.0.1 and FF 6.0a1 and saw the same effect. This looks more like a Toolkit problem.
I hope XUL Widgets is the correct.
comments.creator: richard.marti@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: I hope XUL Widgets is the correct.
